content: woolfull crochet pattern corner to corner baby blanket corner to corner baby blanket before you start pattern is in us terms you will need a 4mm crochet hook and a needle for weaving in ends yarn - three 100g balls of stylecraft special dk shades used are silver pomegranate and lemon row 1 - chain 6 double_crochet double_crochet in 4th chain from hook double_crochet in each of next 2 chains turn row 2 - chain 6 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook and each of next 2 stitches slip_stitch into chain space from previous row chain 3 double_crochet 3 in chain space repeat to end repeat row 2 until half the yarn is used or blanket is required width decrease row when you reach the end of the row turn and slip_stitch into the last three stitches of the previous row slip_stitch into next chain space from previous row chain 3 dc3 in chain space repeat to end repeat this row until your blanket is complete slip stitching around the last corner weave in all ends
